ComicInfo.Summary:
Fred, in Venkman's body, reunites with his mobster bosses after discarding the deceased Ghostbusters in the East River. Meanwhile, Stantz, Spengler, and Zeddemore find themselves in Purgatory, navigating a hostile landscape. As they're attacked by souls, including a seemingly benign elderly woman, Fred declares independence from his former ghostly bosses, emboldened by his new physical form and Ghostbuster equipment.
After evading initial attackers, Zeddemore is drawn to a familiar face, Janelle, separating from the group.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 17:04:30. [CVDB142301] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 09:46:41. [Issue ID 545492]
ComicInfo.Characters: Eliot Ness,Lucky Luciano,Ray Stantz,Peter Venkman,Bugsy Siegel,Egon Spengler,Meyer Lansky,J. Edgar Hoover,Winston Zeddemore,Jelly Bryce,Al Capone
